heading: 2. (1) In this bye-law “Principal Bye-Law” means the Election of Members
text_raw:
2. (1) In this bye-law “Principal Bye-Law” means the Election of Members 
for Appointment to the Podiatrists Registration Board Bye-law 2023 (S.I. No. 
366 of 2023).
text_norm: 2 (1) bye-law principal bye-law mean election member appointment podiatrist registration board bye-law 2023 (s.i no 366 2023)

title: for Appointment to the Podiatrists Registration Board Bye-law 2023 (S.I. No.
heading: 3. Paragraph 7 of the Principal Bye-Law is amended in subparagraph (2)
text_raw:
3. Paragraph 7 of the Principal Bye-Law is amended in subparagraph (2) 

by substituting “23” for “24”. 

GIVEN under the seal of the Podiatrists Registration Board, 

24 January, 2024. 

ANGELA MCANEARNEY , 

Chairperson, Podiatrists Registration Board. 

NOEL BEECHER, 

Member, Podiatrists Registration Board. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 26th January, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [27] 3

heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This bye-law corrects a typographical error in paragraph 7(2) of the Election of 
Members for Appointment to the Podiatrists Registration Board Bye-law 2023.
